4317450.name: Little Girls Dreamventures
4317450.description:
Go to Mind World to save your loved ones

You are Saki Kanami, a lively girl living in Amatocho 5, Tochigi Prefecture.

One day, you witness Xian fall into a nightmare. Since that day, you have been having strange dreams.

To escape from this dream, it seems you must defeat the four Guardians!

Features

An easy-to-understand, classic ARPG system combined with a unique, strange and beautiful dream world.

Work together with your partner Ichigo Kajimoto to explore deeper and deeper.

An unusual training system not often seen in other ARPGs: Stats can be increased through Class.

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
